holidays.title: Crackers Over The Keyboard Day
holidays.description: Get ‘cracking’ to indulge in this rather unusual but fun food holiday.

holidays.title: Emirati Womens Day
holidays.description: Today we honor the ladies of the United Arab Emirates. Happy Women's Day to them.

holidays.title: Late Summer Bank Holiday
holidays.description: Summer comes to an end, and Autumn begins, but not before the Late Summer Bank Holiday!

holidays.title: National Bow Tie Day
holidays.description: The one and only holiday dedicated to everyone’s favorite underrated accessory.

holidays.title: National Cherry Turnover Day
holidays.description: Celebrate this day by devouring some of this delicious French puff pastry dessert.

holidays.title: National Heroes Day of Philippines
holidays.description: Get ready to understand the importance of National Heroes of Philippines Day and its history.

holidays.title: National Heroes' Day
holidays.description: Filipinos celebrate and honor the known and unknown heroes of the Philippine Revolution.

holidays.title: National Power Rangers Day
holidays.description: Suit up! Everybody gets to be a Ranger on National Power Rangers Day.

holidays.title: Race Your Mouse Around the Icons Day
holidays.description: Get your mouse ready, and race your cursor around your system's icon really fast today.

holidays.title: Rainbow Bridge Remembrance Day
holidays.description: The death of a beloved pet, is a sad occasion.

holidays.title: Summer Bank Holiday (England and Wales)
holidays.description: Enjoy the last dregs of the summer holidays by indulging in fun activities at festivals and more!

holidays.title: Florence Welch’s Birthday
holidays.description: She has had a very fruitful career so far; let's look at some of those achievements.

holidays.title: Honey Boo Boo’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this viral sensation, the world's a stage to showcase her unique and funny personality.

holidays.title: Jack Black’s Birthday
holidays.description: The actor isn’t afraid to showcase his goofy personality to entertain people all over the world.

holidays.title: John Allen Nelson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's get to know the famous actor a bit better as we celebrate his birthday.

holidays.title: LeAnn Rimes’s Birthday
holidays.description: Who doesn't love LeAnn Rimes? We get closer to the star by learning more about her.

holidays.title: Leo Tolstoy’s Birthday
holidays.description: The Russian writer, Leo Tolstoy, has made an undeniably huge mark on Western literature!

holidays.title: Roxie Roker’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's get to know this Hollywood icon a bit better as we celebrate her birthday.

holidays.title: Shania Twain’s Birthday
holidays.description: With her heartfelt lyrics and emotion-inducing songs, Twain has no shortage of musical talent.

holidays.title: Tanisha Thomas’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s see what the reality star has been up to in her career.
